parameters.name: AllowCancel
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the O\&M task can be canceled. Valid values:

*   \-1: yes for all O\&M tasks.
*   0: no.
*   1: yes.

parameters.name: AllowChange
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the execution time of the O\&M task can be changed. Valid values:

*   \-1: yes for all O\&M tasks.
*   0: no.
*   1: yes.

parameters.name: ChangeLevel
parameters.description:
The trigger level of the O\&M task. Default value: all. Valid values:

*   all: all task levels.
*   S0: exception fixing.
*   S1: system O\&M.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 25.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the O\&M task. Valid values:

*   \-1: all statuses.
*   3: pending.
*   4: executing.

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description: The type of the O\&M tasks that you want to query. Set the value to all to query all O\&M tasks configured by the Alibaba Cloud account.
